Package utils

Class SharedVariable

java.lang.Object
utils.SharedVariable
public class SharedVariable extends Object
local static variable between the nodes with a buffer size of 1 (any two consecutive writing on the same variable is forbidden).

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static SharedVariable getInstance()
      Getter of instance of shared variable.
      Returns:
      the instance of the shared variable

    • register

      public boolean register​(String name, ArrayList<UUID> allId)
      Register a new variable in the DSM.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the variable
      allId - the IDs of the nodes that should have access to this variable
      Returns:
      false if variable already registered, true otherwise

    • requestLock

      public boolean requestLock​(UUID nodeId, String name)
      Requesting the writing lock for a variable.
      Parameters:
      nodeId - Id of the node
      name - name of the variable
      Returns:
      true if node equal to fixture owner or nodeID

    • write

      public boolean write​(UUID senderId, String name, Object variable)
      write a new value to the distributed shared memory with the given name. In case the name is assigned with another type, the variable will be overwritten.
      Parameters:
      senderId - node UUID
      name - name of the value
      variable - variable to overwrite
      Returns:
      Ture in case of success, False otherwise.

    • read

      public AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<UUID,​Object> read​(UUID nodeId, String name) throws NullPointerException
      read the value of a DSM variable.
      Parameters:
      nodeId - the reader node ID
      name - name of the variable
      Returns:
      value if there is a value for the given name null otherwise.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

    • getOwner

      public UUID getOwner​(String name)
      get the owner of the lock for a specific variable.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the variable
      Returns:
      owner of the variable

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty​(UUID nodeId, String name)
      Checks whether there is a value with that variable name or not.
      Parameters:
      nodeId - Id of the node
      name - name of the variable
      Returns:
      true if empty false otherwise

    • releaseLock

      public void releaseLock​(UUID nodeId, String name)
      releases lock for given name and ID.
      Parameters:
      nodeId - Id of the node
      name - name of the variable
